title: Truman addressing a group
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman speaking to a group in the auditorium of the Harry S. Truman Library.

title: Truman addressing a group
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman speaking to a group in the auditorium of the Harry S. Truman Library. The other person seated on the stage is unidentified.

title: Truman addressing a group
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman speaking to a group in the auditorium of the Harry S. Truman Library. The woman seated on the stage behind Mr. Truman is Sue Gentry.

title: Truman addressing a group
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman speaking to a group in the auditorium of the Harry S. Truman Library. The woman seated on the stage is Independence Examiner reporter Sue Gentry.

title: Solomon Young
Scopenote: Harry S. Truman's maternal grandfather, Solomon Young. From the Kansas City Star.

title: Former Presidents Truman and Eisenhower at Truman Library
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman (left) with former President Dwight D. Eisenhower (right), during Eisenhower's visit to the Harry S. Truman Library.
